text: Sherwood Louis "Sherry" Boehlert (September 28, 1936 - September 20, 2021) was an American politician. He was born in Utica, New York. He was a member of the Republican Party. From 1983 to 2007, he was a member of the United States House of Representatives. Boehlert died on September 20, 2021 under hospice care from dementia-related problems in New Hartford, New York at the age of 84. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Voting record maintained by the Washington Post Category:1936 births Category:2021 deaths Category:United States representatives from New York (state) Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:People from Utica, New York Category:Deaths from dementia
title: Sherwood Boehlert
